//academic agree/disagreeing Which of the following explanations best describes agree? Which of the words below means:
to have the same opinion as someone else, or to say that you do - a formal word Which of the following explanations best describes share? Which of the following explanations best describes accept? Which of the words below means:
a situation in which people agree about something Which of the following explanations best describes consensus? Which of the following explanations best describes dissent? Which of the following explanations best describes unanimous? Which of the following explanations best describes disagree? Which of the following explanations best describes dispute? Which of the words below means:
to cause strong disagreement among a group of people Which of the following explanations best describes share? Which of the following explanations best describes accept? Which of the following explanations best describes agreement? Which of the words below means:
things that people agree about, especially when there are other things that they disagree about Which of the words below means:
agreed about by everyone involved - used about decisions and opinions
Which of the words below means:
to make something happen, especially something unpleasant Which of the following explanations best describes motivate? Which of the following explanations best describes excite? Which of the words below means:
to cause a particular feeling in people such as interest or jealousy Which of the words below means:
to make something that did not exist start to exist Which of the words below means:
to cause serious trouble or changes to happen very quickly - used about a small action or event Which of the following explanations best describes provoke? Which of the following explanations best describes precipitate? Which of the words below means:
to deliberately encourage people to cause trouble, fight, argue etc
Which of the words below means:
to keep changing from a high level to a low level and back again Which of the following explanations best describes mutate? Which of the words below means:
to completely change something, especially so that it is much better Which of the words below means:to completely and permanently change the way people do something or think about something Which of the following explanations best describes revise? Which of the following explanations best describes alter? Which of the words below means:
to change and be different, depending on the time, place, situation etc Which of the words below means:
to develop and change gradually over a long period of time Which of the words below means:
to change what you are doing so that you are not following an expected plan, idea, or type of behaviour Which of the following explanations best describes reform? Which of the words below means:
to change an idea or plan because of new information Which of the words below means:
to completely change something, especially so that it is much better Which of the words below means:
to change a law, system, or organization, so that it is fairer or more effective
Which of the words below means:
a small change made to something you have written or said Which of the words below means:
a change that makes someone or something slightly different Which of the following explanations best describes adjustment? Which of the words below means:
a small change made to a design, plan, or system in order to improve it Which of the following explanations best describes amendment? Which of the words below means:
a complete change from a bad situation to a good one Which of the words below means:
a very big change that often causes problems Which of the following explanations best describes revolution? Which of the words below means:
a complete change in something or someone, that leads to a great improvement Which of the words below means:
a complete and sudden change in the way someone thinks or behaves Which of the following explanations best describes correction? Which of the following explanations best describes alteration? Which of the words below means:
a small change made to a design, plan, or system in order to improve it Which of the words below means:
a small change made to a machine, a system, or a calculation
Which of the following explanations best describes changeable? Which of the following explanations best describes erratic? Which of the words below means:
likely to change suddenly and become worse Which of the following explanations best describes unstable? Which of the following explanations best describes variable? Which of the words below means:
changing too often from good to bad Which of the words below means:
changing a lot in a short period of time - used especially about weather Which of the following explanations best describes flexible? Which of the following explanations best describes adaptable? Which of the following explanations best describes fickle? Which of the words below means:
likely to change suddenly and become worse
Which of the words below means:to reduce something by half Which of the following explanations best describes lessen?
